title: Looking for a new home for the development of Dedalus?

content.raw:
Dear Dedalus developers,

Soon, you will have to move away from [bitbucket.org](http://bitbucket.org).

You can consider using [https://foss.heptapod.net](https://foss.heptapod.net), which is a great alternative for development based on Mercurial. 

See [https://heptapod.net/a-public-heptapod-for-free-and-open-source-software.html](https://heptapod.net/a-public-heptapod-for-free-and-open-source-software.html)

[https://foss.heptapod.net](https://foss.heptapod.net) now host PyPy \(and FluidDyn\) development.

Pierre \(dev [https://foss.heptapod.net/fluiddyn](https://foss.heptapod.net/fluiddyn)\)
